column5: Ten days till we lift off from Cordingley Lake and soar above the wilds of Northern Ontario with Nakina Airlines to our destination of Melchett Lake. We have been to Melchett many times and can't believe this trip will be anything but GREAT as the past ones have been. Looking forward to seeing my friends at Arctic Watershed Outposts and Nakina Air Lines.
x2 our countdown is 29 days flying into Kayedon with Remi/Christine.Getting together with family and cousins for a week
